params.bettingPeriodBlocks: The number of blocks for the betting period
params.participants: The participants of the private game

params.number: The number the bettor bet on, between 1 and 25

createPrivateGame(uint256,uint256,addres.notice: Create a private game, only accessible by the participants. The private game might have custom bettingPeriodBlocks and minBetValue.

getFirstCloseablePublicGame().notice: Get the first closeable public game

getPrivateGameInvitations(address).notice: Get the private game invitations of a participant

getPrize(uint256).notice: Get the prize value of a bet

requestPrizePayment(uint256).notice: Request the prize payment of a bet

timeLeft(uint256).notice: Get the time left for a game to reach the minimum ending block
